entry.title: US West Coast
entry.summary:
In ~Aug 2019 I made plans to fly down to South Africa to hike the Otter Trail. Due to circumstances out of my control I was forced to change my plans.

With the pandemic in full swing I requested ~4 weeks of leave so that I could quarantine in SA before the hikeâ€¦ but that was early on and optimistic. When it became clear I would have to cancel I planned this roadtrip (using three of the four weeks) instead.
